member.name: T:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibrary
member.summary: Defines a puzzle library that stores in a file.

member.name: F:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibrary.Solver
member.summary: Indicates the solver to verify the puzzle.

member.name: M:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibrary.#ctor(System.String,Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibraryIgnoringOption)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the specified puzzle library file.
member.exception: Throws when the specified file path is invalid or the file does not exist.
Throws when the argument is not defined in enumeration type.

member.name: P:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibrary.IgnoringOption
member.summary: Indicates the ignore option that will be used for ignoring on iteration of library file.

member.name: M:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibrary.GetPuzzlesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Try to get puzzles from the target file, and parses them, returning the valid list of encapsulated instances.
member.param: The cancellation token that can cancel the operation.
member.returns: A instance that encapsulates the current asynchronous operation, with an of value to be returned.

member.name: T:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibraryIgnoringOption
member.summary: Indicates the option that will be used for ignoring puzzles in the target file.

member.name: F:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibraryIgnoringOption.Never
member.summary: Indicates the puzzle will be never ignored.

member.name: F:Sudoku.IO.PuzzleLibraryIgnoringOption.NotUnique
member.summary: Indicates the puzzle will be ignored when it is not unique.
